text: Michael Joseph "Mike" Dunleavy, Jr. (born September 15, 1980 in Fort Worth, Texas)2002 NBA Draft: Mike Dunleavy Jr. Draft Bio, ESPN.com is an American professional basketball player. In 2013, he joined the Chicago Bulls of the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Cleveland Cavaliers players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Indiana Pacers players Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:People from Beaverton, Oregon Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Fort Worth, Texas Category:Sportspeople from Oregon
title: Mike Dunleavy Jr.
